CustomField.description: Formula field that associates code with the ampi__IATI_Flow_Type__c
CustomField.formula: CASE(ampi__IATI_Flow_Type__c, "ODA",10, "OOF",20, "Non-export credit OOF",21, "Officially supported export credits",22, "Private Grants",30, "Private market",35, "Private Foreign Direct Investment",36, "Other Private flows at market terms",37, "Non flow",40, "Other flows",50,null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Code corresponding to the IATI Flow Type
CustomField.label: IATI Flow Type Code
